game.name: Loretta's Brand-New Job
game.shortDescription: Elio's peaceful life undergoes a dramatic change as he takes on the role of editor-in-chief of his party's paper!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Elio's peaceful life undergoes a dramatic change as he takes on the role of editor-in-chief of his party's paper!

reviewHighlights.text: So this game has it's issues, but the the NTR is good, the artwork is solid, and it respects your time. I wasn't planning on doing a pure run, but i h...
